product_name: Riderz Cable Combo You Set It Lock - Girls'
long_description: A colorful kids' bike lock at a great value, the Riderz Cable Combo You Set It Lock for girls offers a tough steel cable covered in smooth vinyl and a colorful look she'll adore. The Riderz Cable Combo You Set It Lock for girls uses a 4-digit resettable combination lock so no one has to worry about lost keys.
